mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.refund_id AS "refundId", a.item_id AS "itemId", a.item_name AS "itemName", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_num AS "goodsNum", a.goods_unit AS "goodsUnit", a.pay_price AS "payPrice", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT a.item_id AS "itemId", a.item_name AS "itemName" FROM order_refund_goods a WHERE a.item_id = #{itemId} AND a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_refund_goods( id, order_id, refund_id, item_id, item_name, goods_id, goods_name, goods_num, goods_unit, pay_price, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{refundId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsNum}, #{goodsUnit}, #{payPrice}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_refund_goods SET order_id = #{orderId}, refund_id = #{refundId}, item_id = #{itemId}, item_name = #{itemName}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_num = #{goodsNum}, goods_unit = #{goodsUnit}, pay_price = #{payPrice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
